entry.string: SiteContact is a simple module that allows visitors to easily contact the Site Administrator by email.
entry.translation: SeeteCuntect is a seemple-a mudoole-a thet elloos feesiturs tu ieseely cuntect zee Seete-a Edmeenistretur by imeeel.

entry.string: Install from the administration module listing. There are no tables involved. Once installed, setup the module configuration in Modify Config option.
entry.translation: Instell frum zee edmeenistreshun mudoole-a leesting. Zeere-a ere-a nu tebles infulfed. Bork bork bork! Oonce-a instelled, setoop zee mudoole-a cunffeegooreshun in Mudeeffy Cunffeeg oopshun.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found at http://xaraya.athomeandabout.com
entry.translation: Extended inffurmeshun ebuoot thees mudoole-a cun be-a fuoond et http://xaraya.athomeandabout.com
